Card.Name: Mogg Fanatic
Card.RulesText: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: It deals 1 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Thunderscape Familiar
Card.RulesText: First strike Black spells and green spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

Card.Name: Suq'Ata Lancer
Card.RulesText: Haste Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

Card.Name: Ghitu Slinger
Card.RulesText: Echo {2}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Ghitu Slinger enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Keldon Champion
Card.RulesText: Haste Echo {2}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Keldon Champion enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

Card.Name: Avalanche Riders
Card.RulesText: Haste Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Avalanche Riders enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

Card.Name: Shard Phoenix
Card.RulesText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Sacrifice Shard Phoenix: It deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. {R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.

Card.Name: Soldevi Adnate
Card.RulesText: {T}, Sacrifice a black or artifact creature: Add an amount of {B} equal to the sacrificed creature's mana value.

Card.Name: Skulking Ghost
Card.RulesText: Flying When Skulking Ghost becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

Card.Name: Black Knight
Card.RulesText: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)

Card.Name: Dauthi Marauder
Card.RulesText: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

Card.Name: Abyssal Specter
Card.RulesText: Flying Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

Card.Name: Sengir Vampire
Card.RulesText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

Card.Name: Blazing Specter
Card.RulesText: Flying, haste Whenever Blazing Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

Card.Name: Duress
Card.RulesText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

Card.Name: Funeral Charm
Card.RulesText: Choose one — • Target player discards a card. • Target creature gets +2/-1 until end of turn. • Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

Card.Name: Lightning Bolt
Card.RulesText: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Diabolic Edict
Card.RulesText: Target player sacrifices a creature.

Card.Name: Addle
Card.RulesText: Choose a color. Target player reveals their hand and you choose a card of that color from it. That player discards that card.

Card.Name: Stupor
Card.RulesText: Target opponent discards a card at random, then discards a card.

Card.Name: Yawgmoth's Agenda
Card.RulesText: You can't cast more than one spell each turn. You may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

Card.Name: Terminate
Card.RulesText: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

Card.Name: Guerrilla Tactics
Card.RulesText: Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to any target. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Ghitu Fire
Card.RulesText: You may cast Ghitu Fire as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Ghitu Fire deals X damage to any target.

Card.Name: Kaervek's Torch
Card.RulesText: As long as Kaervek's Torch is on the stack, spells that target it cost {2} more to cast. Kaervek's Torch deals X damage to any target.

Card.Name: Pyrokinesis
Card.RulesText: You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

Card.Name: Fireblast
Card.RulesText: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Fireblast deals 4 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Bloodstained Mire
Card.RulesText: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Bloodstained Mire: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Badlands
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
